EnumProperty.Name: MmkDebugStackConfig
EnumProperty.Description: Which libMmkDebugStack library configuration variant to link against (if linking)

EnumProperty.Name: MmkDebugStackLink
EnumProperty.Description: Which libMmkDebugStack library platform/architecture to link or build, if any.

EnumValue.Name: LinkMsAndroidArmClang36
EnumValue.Description: Link against Android ARM libs (built with Clang 3.6 via MS Android SDK, targeting Unwind.)

EnumValue.Name: LinkNvAndroidArmGcc49
EnumValue.Description: Link against Android ARM libs (built with GCC 4.9 via nVidia CodeWorks, targeting Unwind.)

EnumValue.Name: LinkWindowsX86v140
EnumValue.Description: Link against Windows x86 libs (built with v140 / VS2015, targeting DbgHelp.)

EnumValue.Name: LinkWindowsX64v140
EnumValue.Description: Link against Windows x64 libs (built with v140 / VS2015, targeting DbgHelp.)

EnumValue.Name: SrcDbghelp
EnumValue.Description: Reference & build source code in project instead of linking directly. Build to use DbgHelp.

EnumValue.Name: SrcUnwind
EnumValue.Description: Reference & build source code in project instead of linking directly. Build to use libunwind.

EnumValue.Name: SrcFallback
EnumValue.Description: Reference & build source code in project instead of linking directly. Build against fallback.

EnumValue.Name: None
EnumValue.Description: Don't build or link against libMmkDebugStack at all.
